parameters.name: Bot Token
parameters.description: The telegram bot token. It can be left empty and be filled when calling the endpoint with key 'token'.

parameters.name: Chat Identifier
parameters.description: Chat Identifier. It can be left empty and be filled when calling the endpoint with key 'chat'.

parameters.name: Chat Message
parameters.description: Chat Message. It can be left empty and be filled when calling the endpoint with key 'message'.
